GSD.description:
f2fs: fix to tag gcing flag on page during file defragment

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.4 by commit 5d3bba6b1616b0852ffb8384fff8febfa530b8a7. For more details please see the references link.
